properties.comment: Linked data queries for vegetation types
properties.entry: The European Vegetation Survey developed an overview of European vegetation units, syntaxa, providing a standardising tool in classifying vegetation types across Europe.

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX h: <http://eunis.eea.europa.eu/rdf/habitats-schema.rdf#>
SELECT ?name ?definition sql:group_concat(?alternative,'; ') AS ?alternatives ('Schaminee et al, 2012' AS ?reftext) ('/references/2460' AS ?reflink) WHERE { GRAPH <http://eunis.eea.europa.eu/rdf/habitats.rdf.gz> { <http://eunis.eea.europa.eu/habitats/[IDENTIFIER]> owl:sameAs ?EUNIS_code } _:rec skos:inScheme <http://www.synbiosys.alterra.nl/rdf/syntaxa/> . _:rec skos:closeMatch ?EUNIS_code . _:rec skos:prefLabel ?name . _:rec skos:definition ?definition . _:rec skos:notation ?code OPTIONAL { _:rec skos:altLabel ?alternative } } GROUP BY ?code ?name ?definition ?EUNIS_code
